name: 06_type_ahead
description: A Port of Wes Boss' JavaScript30 examples to PureScript. See https://github.com/wesbos/JavaScript30

scripts.clean: rimraf output && rimraf dist && rimraf bower_components && rimraf .pulp-cache && rimraf .purs-repl && rimraf node_modules
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run install && npm run build && npm run exec
